description:
Rin’s having a normal day when he learns he’s been chosen to marry one of the two new girls in class: Sia, Princess of the Gods. and Nerine, Princess of the Demons.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kami ni mo Akuma ni mo Nareru Otoko
The Man Who Could Become a God or a Demon!
神にも悪魔にもなれる男
